resources.string: To calibrate sensitivity you will need a steady sound source and a calibrated SPL meter. Turn on the sound source and the reference meter. Adjust the sensitivity until the two dB readings match. When satisfied, press SET CALIBRATION to save.

"To measure sound pressure level, you will need a steady sound source and a calibrated SPL, the calibration needs to be done prior to the measurement. Turn on the sound and press AV to monitor SPL. Press the START button to start your measurement. "

The measurement will automatically finish after 10 seconds, if you wish to conduct a new measurement and discard the completed one, simply press the START Button once again, otherwise press the FINISH button
